def init_primes(n):
       	primes = []
        is_prime = [True] * n
        is_prime[0] = False
        is_prime[1] = False
        for i in xrange(2, n):
           	if not is_prime[i]:
                	continue
            	for j in xrange(i * i, n, i):
                	is_prime[j] = False
     
        primes = [i for i in xrange(n) if is_prime[i]]
        return primes
     
     
primes = init_primes(10000)
     
     
def phi(primes, n):
       	result = 1

        for p in primes:
           	if p > n:
                	break
     
            	if n % p == 0:
                	e = 0
                	c = n
                	while c % p == 0:
                    		e += 1
                    		c /= p
     
                	result *= (p ** (e - 1)) * (p - 1)
        return result
     
     
for _ in xrange(int(raw_input())):
       	print phi(primes, int(raw_input()))
